price: Sababa kanaan adabbii dalagaa ishee dhamdhamte Booddeen dubbii ishees hongoo ta'e.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
